Question.Text: A. Which of the following best define your role in the organization?
Question.QuestionAnswer: In charge of multiple IT functions including enterprise applications

Answer.Text: In charge of multiple IT functions including enterprise applications

Question.Text: 1. What is your agreement with each of the statement below with respect to YOUR organizational reality? Please rate on a five-point scale where 5= Extremely High and 1= Extremely Low. Please consider ‘what it is today’ and not ‘what you wish it to be’!

Topic.Text: Our customers demand seamless experience across multiple touch points
Our competitors are leveraging digital, there is an internal pressure to match up
Our speed of response to competition is under pressure
New competitors with different business models are emerging
Top management is in favor of a digital enabled business model
Our planning demands higher predictability in business outcomes
Internal business users are demanding faster digital applications
Cost reduction is a strategic focus in our organization
Employee productivity is a strategic focus in our organization
Risk management is a strategic focus in our organization
Supply chain effectiveness and efficiency is a strategic focus in our organization
Regulatory compliance demands digital enablement
Our cost model is under pressure
Our pricing model is under pressure
Our ability to charge premium is under pressure

Question.Text: 2. Which of the following statements most closely depicts your personal take on BUSINESS CLOUD? SINGLE CODE.
Question.QuestionAnswer: Heard and have clear idea but not implemented

Answer.Text: Heard and have clear idea but not implemented

Question.Text: 3. We have identified 16 dimensions related to an organization's ‘current preparations and future plans’ with respect to a Business Cloud. Kindly rate your organization on each of these dimensions using a 7-point scale, where 7= strong focus and high readiness achieved and 1=low focus and low readiness achieved. Please consider ‘what it is today’ and not ‘what you wish it to be’!

Topic.Text: Cloud enablement of mission critical or core business applications
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Cloud enablement of mission support or peripheral business applications
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Cloud deployment of tools for applications development, operations, and management
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Seamless weaving of multiple application environments, across cloud and in-premise
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Open and flexible cloud native architecture that can plug and play on any ‘Infrastructure as a Service’ Platform
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Broad based automation of business processes
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Leveraging chatbots, robotic process automation and machine learning to simplify user experience and productivity
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Integration of enterprise value chain - customer facing processes with core operations and back office
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Integration of extended supply chain - enterprise with suppliers and distributors
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Answer.Text: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Topic.Text: Common clean master data across business cloud application landscapes for customer 360
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Capability to handle Datamarts and BigData
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Answer.Text: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Topic.Text: Operational, Strategic and Predictive analytics across the enterprise value chain for measuring KPIs
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Answer.Text: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Topic.Text: Capability to ensure data privacy and protection
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Topic.Text: Capability to deliver innovative use cases at ‘scale’ across the enterprise value chain
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Answer.Text: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Topic.Text: Capability to deliver innovative use cases with ‘speed’ across the enterprise value chain
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Answer.Text: Strong focus and high readiness aimed in 2 years

Topic.Text: Capability for innovation with emerging technologies like IoT/ Blockchain
Topic.TopicAnswer: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Answer.Text: Strong focus and moderate readiness achieved

Question.Text: 4. What are/ could be the key challenges in building a Business Cloud platform for your organization? MULTIPLE CODES.
Question.QuestionAnswer: IT Infrastructure does not support,Lack of skills and competencies to migrate and manage

Answer.Text: Lack of skills and competencies to migrate and manage

Question.Text: 5. Do you plan to overhaul your applications architecture to build a robust cloud native business applications platform? SINGLE CODE.

6. Which vendor in your opinion is most competent to deliver a BUSINESS CLOUD?
SINGLE CODE.

7. Who is your principal application vendor for the following business domains?
SINGLE CODE

Topic.Text: Core Industry Application
Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
Digital Marketing
Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)
Human Resource Management
Supply Chain Management (SCM)

Question.Text: 8. Which of the following is closest to your application strategy? SINGLE CODE.
9. What’s the IT budget of your organization for 2019-20 (In Crore INR)? SINGLE CODE.

Topic.Text: BCRS
AC
AAP
IVC
DC
SI
CAS
BCRS2
MATRIX LABEL
